channel.title: Truffle on Sumanta Bose
channel.description: Recent content in Truffle on Sumanta Bose

item.title: Truffle pet-shop installation and setup guide
item.description: Sources http://truffleframework.com/boxes/pet-shop http://truffleframework.com/tutorials/pet-shop http://truffleframework.com/tutorials/ Steps to install and setup by cloning this repository Install Truffle if you don’t already have it. sh $ npm install -g truffle Clone this repository and access it’s root directory sh $ git clone https://github.com/sumantabose/pet-shop-ethereum-truffle.git $ cd pet-shop-ethereum-truffle In the pet-shop-ethereum-truffle/ root directory truffle compile the smart contracts (see step 5 and 6 below). sh $ truffle compile Download, install and run Ganache (step 7 below).
